column4: Hello, I've encountered a silly issue with my newly installed server. I was powering it down, giving a 5 minute warning when the power went and now I can't access it anymore... It just says "The system is going down for maintenance in 4 minutes" no matter what I do. Any suggestions?
I assume you are remote from the server and trying to access using ssh or something?
the chances are that you will need to locally attach keyboard and monitor to the server or try a physical reboot.
can you try CTL+ALT+F2 and see if you get a second login screen?
